tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (VP (VBG gon) (S (VP (TO na) (VP (VB be) (PP (IN on) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN road)) (PP (IN for) (NP (CD 6) (NNS hours))))) (NP-TMP (NN today)))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [gon/VBG xcomp>[road/NN mark>na/TO cop>be/VB case>on/IN det>the/DT nmod:for>[hours/NNS case>for/IN nummod>6/CD] nmod:tmod>today/NN] punct>./.]
